tasks.task_description: Reset all usage counters (anonymous and registered users)
Test Anonymous Flow: 3 searches → registration prompt
Test Registered Flow: marketplace token → 10 searches/day
Test Pro Flow: unlimited searches with PRO badge
Test Quota Exceeded: proper 429 handling with tier preservation
Verify API-level token validation and usage increment
Verify Lambda-level integration and response handling

description: Complete FAISS-Marketplace integration testing with fresh usage counters - all three access workflows from MARKETPLACE_FAISS_INTEGRATION_ANALYSIS.md
context: Reset all usage counters - cleared anonymous usage table and reset registered user daily usage to 0
Anonymous flow tested successfully - 3 searches allowed (1,2,3 remaining), then 429 with proper registration URL and tier preservation
Registered flow tested successfully - 10 searches allowed with proper usage increment (1,3,5,7,9,10), then 429 with upgrade URL and tier/user preservation
Pro flow tested successfully - unlimited searches confirmed, tier=pro, remaining='unlimited', user context preserved
Quota exceeded tested successfully - immediate 429 response with tier preservation, correct usage counts, upgrade URL, and user context preservation
API-level testing completed successfully - token validation works, usage increments properly (1,2,3,4,5), invalid tokens rejected with 403
Lambda-level integration tested successfully - valid token integration works, invalid token fallback to anonymous, pure anonymous access, and proper response structure validation all pass
